snippet: The Federal Aviation Administration is restricting airspace above a lava flow on Hawaii’s Big Island because of an increasing number of people wanting to view it from the sky.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Aviation Administration is restricting airspace above a lava flow on Hawaii’s Big Island because of an increasing number of people wanting to view it from the sky.

headline.main: Hawaii: Air Traffic Is Curbed Over Volcano
headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Air Traffic Is Curbed Over Volcano
